author: sebb
msg: Fix potential NPE if proxied stream supports write((byte[]) null) without complaining

author: mcooper
msg: TRINIDAD-1930 Ability to easily create a meta tag
Added a new trh:meta tag so that you can generate an html meta tag for things like reloading the page or configuring viewport characteristics like these:
It is also important to note that a meta HTML tag cannot have an ID so the component ID will not be rendered into the browser source.

author: minfrin
msg: Overhaul the apr_file_io.h doxygen documentation so to no longer reference
deprecated #defines. Fix various cut and paste errors.
Submitted by: Stefan Ruppert <ml ruppert-it de>

author: mcooper
msg: TRINIDAD-1930 Ability to easily create a meta tag
Added a new trh:meta tag so that you can generate an html meta tag for things like reloading the page or configuring viewport characteristics like these:
